messages.content: AIMI technician: how are you feeling?
AIMI technician: can you introduce yourself?
I'm Holocorp Overview. I'm an assistant created for the FX350 league pilots and staff.
AIMI technician: excellent, what team are you rooting for?
The databank is temporary unavailable. I can't tell you the full list, but I'm designed to not be biased, so I'm not "rooting" for anyone.
AIMI technician: very well, can you tell me who's playing right now?
ThatOneBonk has a lobby going with another player in. They're running Anulpha Pass Reverse on Phantom.
AIMI technician: well, this concludes our little checkup, you'll be dropped into the chatroom wiht the pilots now, good luck
